name: A Plague Tale: Devastation
description:
What if you control the rats from A Plague Tale: Innocence ? 

Discover a 1min adventure made for the Micro Fangame Jam 2019.

As on the original game rats can't support light. Sacrifice members of your team to extinguish fire. Kill the soldier and reach the end of the level.

Controls :

Use AD to move

Click on light source to switch it off 

Click on soldier to kill him

Assets use : 

  • Rats from Metal Slug 2 
  • Pixel art environment : Pixel Castle 2D by Szadi art
  • Knight Sprite by Warren Clark
  • Explosion Sprite from Will's Pixel Explosion Pack
  • Song : A Plague Tale - Olivier Deriviere
  • Sounds from Universal-Soundbank
